sbs_example_4: pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, yā sā vācā n'elā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅ'gamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti

sbs_example_3: luddho pan'āyaṃ purisapuggalo lobhena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto pāṇam'pi hanati, adinnam'pi ādiyati, paradāram'pi gacchati, musā'pi bhaṇati, param'pi tathattāya samādapeti, yaṃ sa hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyā'ti.
moneyyaṃ te upaññissaṃ, dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ, handa te naṃ pavakkhāmi, santhambhassu daḷho bhava.
so tesaṃ bhogānaṃ ārakkh'ādhikaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, kin'ti me bhoge n'eva rājāno hareyyuṃ, na corā hareyyuṃ, na aggi daheyya, na udakaṃ vaheyya, na appiyā dāy'ādā hareyyun'ti

sbs_example_4: tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbe, mettaṃ karotha mānusiyā pajāya. divā ca ratto ca haranti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha appamattā.

sbs_example_3: ahañ'c'eva kho pana jarādhammo samāno jaraṃ anatīto paraṃ jiṇṇaṃ disvā aṭṭīyeyyaṃ harāyeyyaṃ jiguccheyyaṃ na m'etaṃ assa patirūpan'ti.
ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaparamaṃ sahatthā haritabbāni, asante hārake.

sbs_example_4: seyyathā'pi, bhikkhave, rajako vā cittakārako vā rajanāya vā lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā
yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā, antamaso has'āpekkho'pi, pācittiyaṃ.

sbs_example_3: dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukham'āvahati. es'ānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī.

sbs_example_4: bhārā have pañcakkhandhā, bhārahāro ca puggalo. bhār'ādānaṃ dukhaṃ loke, bhāranikkhepanaṃ sukhaṃ.

sbs_example_3: ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaparamaṃ sahatthā haritabbāni, asante hārake.
tuvaṃhi no brahmasamo'si saccaṃ, kathaṃ upapajjati brahmalokaṃ jutima.
yaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha. taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
yatha'y'idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ, tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lok'ānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ

sbs_example_4: yaṃ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṃ sāvakānaṃ hit'esinā anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya, kataṃ vo taṃ mayā.

sbs_example_3: uyyuñjanti satīmanto, na nikete ramanti te, haṃsā'va pallalaṃ hitvā, okam'okaṃ jahanti te.

sbs_chant_eng_2: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self
sbs_example_3: na dīgham'āyuṃ labhate dhanena, na c'āpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti. appaṃ h'idaṃ jīvitam'āhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ.

sbs_example_4: paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmi yāva'd'eva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāya ḍaṃsamakasavāt'ātapasiriṃsapasamphassānaṃ paṭighātāya yāva'd'eva hirikopinapaṭicchādan'atthaṃ
sītavātaparittāṇaṃ, hirikopīnachādanaṃ. matt'aṭṭhiyaṃ abhuñjiṃsu, santuṭṭhā itar'ītare.
paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmi yāva'd'eva sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāya ḍaṃsamakasavāt'ātapasiriṃsapasamphassānaṃ paṭighātāya yāva'd'eva hirikopīnapaṭicchādan'atthaṃ

sbs_example_3: yāvakīvañ'ca bhikkhave bhikkhū hirimanto bhavissanti
hirīnisedho puriso, koci lokasmi vijjati, yo nindaṃ apabodheti, asso bhadro kasām'iva.

sace'pi dasa pajjote, dhārayissasi, kassapa. n'eva dakkhati rūpāni, cakkhu hi'ssa na vijjatī'ti.
na brāhmaṇass'etad'akiñci seyyo, yadā nisedho manaso piyehi, yato yato hiṃsamano nivattati, tato tato sammati'm'eva dukkhaṃ.
sbs_example_4: na tena ariyo hoti, yena pāṇāni hiṃsati, ahiṃsā sabbapāṇānaṃ, ariyo'ti pavuccati.
mā maṃ apādako hiṃsi, mā maṃ hiṃsi dipādako. mā maṃ catuppado hiṃsi, mā maṃ hiṃsi bahuppado.

sbs_example_3: tasmā't'iha, bhikkhave, yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atīt'ānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā
sbs_chant_eng_3: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self

sbs_example_3: sammādiṭṭhiko kho pana hoti aviparītadassano, atthi dinnaṃ atthi yiṭṭhaṃ atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, atthi ayaṃ loko atthi paro loko, atthi mātā atthi pitā, …
so sace ākaṅkhati, anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhaveyyaṃ, eko'pi hutvā bahudhā assaṃ, bahudhā'pi hutvā eko assaṃ, āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvaṃ
tato tvaṃ bāhiya na tena. yato tvaṃ bāhiya na tena, tato tvaṃ bāhiya na tattha. yato tvaṃ bāhiya na tattha, tato tvaṃ bāhiya n'ev'idha na huraṃ na ubhayam'antarena es'ev'anto dukkhassā'ti
manujassa pamattacārino, taṇhā vaḍḍhati māluvā viya, so plavatī hurā huraṃ, phalam'icchaṃ'va vanasmi vānaro.

sbs_example_4: navaṃ pana bhikkhunā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārayamānena aṭṭh'aṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugat'aṅgulena, aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā. taṃ atikkāmayato, chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

sbs_chant_eng_2: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self
sbs_example_3: iti h'etaṃ vijānāma, navamo so parābhavo. dutiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ.

sbs_example_4: dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā. bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā. n'eva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā

sbs_example_3: kassako kammunā hoti, sippiko hoti kammunā. vāṇijo kammunā hoti, pessako hoti kammunā.
rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, anattā. rūpañ'ca h'idaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, na'y'idaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe, evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī'ti.
sbs_chant_eng_3: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self

sbs_example_3: te atthaladdhā sukhitā, viruḷhā buddhasāsane. arogā sukhitā hotha, saha sabbehi ñātibhī'ti.
saṅkhārā anattā. saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissaṃsu, na'y'idaṃ saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvatteyyuṃ, labbhetha ca saṅkhāresu, evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesun'ti.
sbs_chant_eng_3: The Discourse on the Characteristic of Not-Self

sbs_example_3: alaṃ, āvuso, mā socittha, mā paridevittha, sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇena. upaddutā ca homa, idaṃ vo kappati, idaṃ vo na kappatī'ti.
